heroSection.description: This image showcases the expertise of our plumbers in installing and maintaining complex plumbing systems under residential or commercial buildings. It highlights our ability to work in confined spaces and handle intricate piping configurations.

### Business Information:

- **Alabama Business Registration/License Details**:
  - Professional Plumbing Service LLC is registered as a Limited Liability Company (LLC) in Alabama. However, specific registration details such as the registration date and license numbers are not provided in the available sources.

- **Physical Location and Service Areas**:
  - The physical location of Professional Plumbing Service LLC is at 16005 Veterans Memorial Parkway, Lafayette, Alabama[2].
  - The service areas include Cusseta, Five Points, Fredonia, Huguley, Lafayette, Penton, Waverly, Lee County, Tallapoosa County, and Alexander City, as well as parts of Troup County in Georgia[2].

- **Hours and Payment Methods**:
  - The specific business hours and payment methods are not detailed in the available sources.

- **Years in Operation**:
  - The exact years in operation are not specified, but the business has been active since at least the time it was listed on Houzz, which does not provide a specific start date[2].

### Services & Specialties:

- **Types of Services Offered**:
  - Professional Plumbing Service LLC provides a variety of services including plumbing repair, toilet installation, faucet installation, water heater installation, tankless water heater installation, shower installation, water treatment system installation, basement remodeling, bathroom remodeling, and general contracting[2].

- **Service Areas Covered**:
  - As mentioned, the service areas include several locations in Lee County, Tallapoosa County, and surrounding areas[2].

aboutUs: Professional Plumbing Service LLC is a trusted local plumbing company serving Lee County, Tallapoosa County, and surrounding areas in Alabama. Our team of skilled professionals specializes in a wide range of services, from plumbing repairs and installations to bathroom remodeling and water treatment systems. With a focus on quality workmanship and customer satisfaction, we are committed to providing exceptional service to homeowners and businesses throughout the region.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing a reliable and knowledgeable plumbing partner.
sellingPoints: Comprehensive expertise: Our team is well-versed in all aspects of plumbing, from routine maintenance to complex installations, ensuring your needs are met with precision and efficiency.

Prompt and professional service: We understand the urgency of plumbing issues and prioritize prompt response times, arriving at your doorstep fully equipped to handle any situation with professionalism and care.
Commitment to quality: We take pride in our work and use only the highest-quality materials and techniques, ensuring long-lasting solutions that meet or exceed industry standards.
